====== ComboStrap - Page Header Slot ======


===== About =====
The ''page header slot'' is a [[docs:theme:slot:slot|slot]] that replaces the [[:docs:theme:element:page-header|page header]] in a [[docs:theme:template:template|template]].


{{:docs:theme:element:layout_element.svg?0x250|}}

===== Usage =====



The ''how-to'' getting started guide explains how to create a header navigational bar: [[howto:getting_started:7_menu]].



===== Configuration =====
You can configure the name of the ''header slot'' with the ''tpl»strap»headerslot'' [[docs:app:configuration|configuration]]
